[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of ma1tas mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1816673839
- Lowered the value of the implant as 800 was a bit high - The explosion should now always remove the pawns head since the implant is in the brain - Added an advanced implant with twice the blast-radius

V1.0.2 This mod adds an explosive brain implant. Detonate it at will. Craft it at the fabrication bench when the research Bionics is completed.
Note: This mod is still in development, if you use it on an existant save, don't forget to keep a save from before the mod installation.
